modName: Olafs Bow - Arrows - Hood - Hat - Boots
summary: Olaf\'s Bow and other gear from the famous Olaf the Hunter! Hat, Shoes, and bow.
descriptionHtml:
==================================================================================
DESCRIPTION:
-----------------------------

This mod adds Olaf the Hunter\'s gear to add to the Olaf the Hunter companion by ultrabrilliant. 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22914

Olaf is the star character from the Skyrim YouTube series Rags to Riches by CVG\'s Andy Kelly. 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=EL-d-6H3a38uM&feature=plcp

Even if you don\'t know who Olaf is, the bow and hood are still pretty sweet for those looking to have a realistic ranger type character that is unique and doesn\'t suck at dishing out damage.

This mod requires the latest update to Skyrim. 

I used the vanilla hunting bow textures and added some of my own to create a unique bow just for Olaf, complete with wolf scratches, blood, notches marking his kills, and Olaf\'s name etched into the side.

This is my first mod and I\'m glad to finally give back to the Nexus Community. 

=================================================================================
WHAT\'S ADDED:
-----------------------------

- Olaf\'s Bow - Only the best damn bow you can get (as far as a balanced and realistic looking bow go) Does 24 base damage plus 40 extra damage to animals.
- Olaf\'s Iron Arrow - Iron arrows with a unique custom texture just for Olaf, but with a significant damage increase.
- Olaf\'s Fine Hat - Olaf\'s awesome fine hat (with a little ironic twist for those who have watched the series)
- Olaf\'s Leather Boots - Olaf\'s first pair of boots complete with unique texture added with saw dust from all that wood chopping and, of course, Olaf\'s name!
- Olaf\'s Hood - A new item I made just for my Olaf fallower! Grant Kyne\'s Blessing plus increases marksmanship.

More to come hopefully! Plus I\'m going to retexture the hat and boots to make them unique to olaf!

All items can be forged under steel smithing, Leather smithing, and miscellaneous.

==================================================================================
CHANGE LOG:
-----------------------------

v1.02
fixed the need for the olaf companion file.  It is now a stand alone mod.

v1.01
added unique quiver and boots texture. Boots have sawdust and olaf\'s name. Quiver has claw marks and olaf\'s name.

v1.00
Original file. Added unique bow, hood, hat, boots, and arrows.

==================================================================================
KNOWN BUGS:
-----------------------------

-If you drop Olaf\'s Bow, it disappears.  not sure why. I have the all models added, including the world model of course. If anyone can tell me why this happens, I can fix it.

==================================================================================
THANKS & CREDITS:
-----------------------------

Thanks for all the awesome mods Nexus and all modders whose mods I have used and inspired my mod!

I would also like to thank Olaf for his inspirational success story!

==================================================================================
MODS SHOWN IN IMAGES:
-----------------------------

The one on Olaf is The Witcher King\'s Slayer armor by LordOfWar 
available here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5588 along with a lot of other cool armors. 

The other one on my character is Witcher style Dawnguard heavy plate by Baraban available here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22602
author: Dragonis0
